title: Listen and record music on radio stations of all genres
description:
Listen to live music, actual sports, news, science, documentary, talk, on-demand programs at thousands of radio stations from all around the world!

With friendly simple and streamlined World Radio FM interface, you can easily:
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Search for any particular radio stations around the world playing music and songs of your favorite artists and bands, broadcasting your favorite programs and shows to find them live at the moment
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Filter and choose radio stations by genre, country, and language
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Show now playing list
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Play local radio list
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Play radio in the background
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Record liked radio programs, and manage recordings
Ã¢Ëœâ€¦ Vote for the best by pressing Like and add stations that you like to your favorites list for quick and easy access

Have fun with listening to live radio stations from everywhere in the world and stay tuned for the next update of the World Radio FM.

Please leave feedback, your wishes and feature requests for the next app version at Google Play!


Download World Radio FM at Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.vinternete.wlradio

Download World Radio FM .apk-file from the app website: http://apps.vinternete.com/downloads/WorldLiveRadio-1.5.apk

World Radio FM website: http://radio.vinternete.com
